results.content: The instructor deserve more than 5 star . Thanks a lot for highlighting the steps to take on my journey of been a web developer ???????
results.content_html: The instructor deserve more than 5 star . Thanks a lot for highlighting the steps to take on my journey of been a web developer ???????

response.content:
Hi Eduardo Daniel, thank you for your review. Note that this course is for beginners, you wrote that you know all this stuff, it means that this course is not for you, you are not a beginner. I would definitely appreciate if you reconsider your point and review as it is very important for the new students. 
This course is absolutely free, and as it is written in the description,  it's mainly a blog that was created to help beginners to answer the most questions people when they've just started with web development.
Thank you!
